name: luminously
content:
luminously adverb
(BRIGHTLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that produces or reflects bright light, especially in the dark: A spectacular full moon shone luminously over the lake. Clouds drifted across a luminously blue sky.
More examplesFewer examplesThe starfish seem almost electric they glow so luminously.Lamps of ice gave the building a cool and luminously ethereal glow.The ordinary fruits and flowers glow resplendently and luminously against dark, painted backgrounds.
